subject: Boingo Terms of Service partially read
text:
http://www.boingohotspot.net/ToS.aspx

I scanned their terms of service and noted the following in Article 13:

"Boingo may revise these terms and conditions from time to time by updating
this posting. You should visit this page from time to time to review the
then-current terms and conditions because they are binding upon you."

(this needs to be monitored)

Peace,

//Ian

Ian O'Neill
